title: Fog
description: What looks white and spooky and forms near the ground? Fog! In Fog, students will learn all about this amazing atmospheric phenomenon. Detailed photographs and the use of high-frequency words support emergent readers. This book can also be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose for writing as well as to visualize to better understand the text.
meta: fog, form, ice, spooky, still, water
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /f/ sound
Periods : Recognize and use periods correctly in sentences
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word always

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
